Can't be!She acted as Pres so is up on a charge of Treason.Let her take the fall she so desperately wants to take on their behalf.You installed ppl who identify with all that is foreign and criminal and LETHAL TO THE REPUBLIC. PERSON TO PERSON, ME TO THE CHIEF AS PER THE RULE AND NAMED PROCESS AND TRADITION AND PRECEDENT, MARBURY V MADISON.GET THE LOWEST GUY ON TOTEM POLE, WHO ACTUALLY GRABBED IT, THEN HARRIS, THEN ROBERTS. THOSE IN THE FILING, DOCKETING CHAIN OF CAUSATION. HE ROBERTS ISN'T IN COMMAND OF ANYTHING NOW, NOT EVEN HIS OWN DAMN CLERKS! How does the guy whom JAG ripped apart in a report to the Senate to kill hos nomination and ¬†him from becoming the Judge Advocate General ¬†then magically become...Clerk of SCOTUS and the Chief Justice's personal clerk??I need you to disseminate this to Congress now, starting with your reps.I can no longer afford to absorb all costs.Needs to be snail mailed.I have no way to get to my USPS to mail it and risking 3rd, crossing it?That's where they wait to run me down.A pattern is.3 times, the last? Undeniable.Sorry, dying with my boots on! Acting! Fighting back!You have no excuse, Congress can't address any of this or SCOTUS ethics unless you serve them.Again, ANYTHING that I send you? Do whatever you please with it.If it were defective? The Petition? Lol, they would need to steal it.Meyring? I was asked who helped me PREPARE it.I confessed to crashing Luna too, gave him evidence rising to proof.The Clerks committed so many crimes since 2007 that CLERKS NOT THE JUSTICES CAN'T HAVE THIS DOCUMENT SEE THE LIGHT OF DAY! And? As long as it's only me acting, they can eyeball the post marks and hear my unique voice, then...They refuse to consider that other Plaintiffs are.I was actually told to my face that they truly believe I made it all up, even your names.Here's some images too, some?The tracking number and USPS complaint: they didn't contact me. ü§î ??Prelogar the SG signed for her copy, so The US acknowledged receipt.Then SCOTUS stole the case from the mail upon receipt to keep The People dumb & down on the farm.THE COURT IS THE TOOL/WEAPON THEY ARE USING TO DECEIVE YOU...CITIZENS UNITED? ME & WALMART ARE THE CORRECT PAC CASE! THAT?? CREATED AS A DECEPTION, WHOLE THING A SHOW & RIGGED, TOP TO BOTTOM.WHO IS THIS EXACT LAWYER, A JD AND A MAN!, WHO KEEPS INTERFERING AND EVEN WHISPERING IN THE EAR OF THE CHIEF ETC?DID ROBERTS READ KENNEDYS WORK OR VICE VERSA? DELIVER THE OPINION?THE JUDICIARY NOW EXISTS TO ENSLAVE US TO DC.IF WE JUST GO OUR OWN WAY, RESTORE OUR SELVES AS THE LAWFUL GOVERNMENT AND THEN RESTORE THE LAW UPON CORRECT APP OF THE EP&DP CLAUSES ACCOUNTING FOR HUMAN BIO AND HISTORICAL FACTS?They Congress won't even notice until we call ourselves to order.They're so deeply in denial that they ARE mentally incompetent. Too severely mentally ill.They don't perceive what Biden does as gross or abusive, they DO truly believe in rape, in sex with kids and against the will of their intended target no matter who that target is.Military? Reported to me, they're getting jumped, men, and sexually assaulted on bases now.Robert & I can correct.They're not going to accept anyone else plus we can't be replaced.Our facts.Our skill setS.I stand to protect nontraditional lawyers, well JDs are nontraditional. The price would be traditional, older.They don't teach any of this in law school, only how to be lawless and get away with it. They FORCE you to become brainwashed or you flunk out, get it??Accept what we tell you, spit it back at us on tests etc and then once you're brainwashed, acting upon lies and what's insane and lawless, then we license & certify you.ü§≠ü§£ Robert would state the technical names for abuses & crime by JUDGES.Every other lawyer I spoke to? It's mentally ill to the point of incapacitation but LEGALLY, WHAT'S THAT ACT NAMED?Lawyers lie, lie, lie, lie to my face.Legal aid? ü§£ Set an appt. With me. Then never showed.This? ABOUT 100% CORRUPTION, ALL OFFICES BIT WHEN NOBODY EXCEPT ME WAS BABYSITTING THE JDs WHO ARE NOW 100% OF THE FEDERAL JUDICIARY, JUDGES & CLERKS.0% WORK, ACT FOR THE BEST OR ANY INTEREST OF US EXACTLY, WOMEN OR THE PEOPLE. With points of law like the Hawaiians?I opened the door, filed the point & a line of reasoning that they can stand upon. It's airtight. Up to them to speak, make their case! They can appear before us as the Constitutional Convention is in progress.Make it to The People so The People's delegates.Ya know....Every 30 or 50 yeats or so...You should hold a convention.Law doesn't change nor does app. The extraordinary is. New is too. Like tech.We can address whatever is in the process of being broken or causing harm.You van repeal harmful crap, use code etc to address social shit.You don't legislate social awareness, that is mostly a fad and transient once women are RECOGNIZED.MEN EN MASSE ARE IN ABSOLUTE DENIAL ABOUT WOMEN SO SELVES!!!¬†Add a note, inform them as to WHAT they're reading and that it was filed.If someone acts to steal a doc or refuse to accept receipt of it?Considered filed as we aren't accountable or responsible for their actions.You simply make people aware that it WAS RECEIVED BY ALL.End
